name: ServiceNow-CICD-App-Install
description: Installs the specified application from the application repository onto the local instance
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: scope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if sys_id is not specified. The scope name of the application, such as x_aah_custom_app. You can locate this value in the scope field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: sysId
inputs.label: sys_id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if scope is not specified. The sys_id of the application to install. You can locate this value in the Sys ID field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the application to install. Default: Latest

inputs.name: autoUpgradeBaseApp
inputs.label: Auto Upgrade Base App
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only applicable if Application Customization is active and the associated application is a higher version than the currently installed version. Default: false

inputs.name: baseAppVersion
inputs.label: Base App Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the base application on which to apply the customizations.

OutputVariables.name: rollbackVersion
OutputVariables.description: Previously installed app's version, used to roll-back task
